text: In what context? CRM UI Extension?
Yes.  Idea is a tab based custom card that would display pictures, or even other items, that are attached to a ticket.
Are you trying to build it or looking for support? I'd be interested in prototyping this for you.
I think this should be doable and quite an interesting use case.
I was not sure if HS put any limitation on what React components could do.  I've actually seen this use case a couple of times now.
As long as you use their components, should be doable
